languages.text: "Рискованнее отправляться туда с неисправным кибермастифом. Но время не терпит, и мне придется действовать в тех обстоятельствах, что есть".
"It would be riskier still to go with a malfunctioning cyber-mastiff. Since I am pressed for time, I will simply have to adapt to the circumstances."
languages.original_text: "Рискованнее отправляться туда с неисправным кибермастифом. Но время не терпит, и мне придется действовать в тех обстоятельствах, что есть".

traits.locale_text: "It would be riskier still to go with a malfunctioning cyber-mastiff. Since I am pressed for time, I will simply have to adapt to the circumstances."
"It would be riskier still to go with a malfunctioning cyber-mastiff. Since I am pressed for time, I will simply have to adapt to the circumstances."
"It would be riskier still to go with a malfunctioning cyber-mastiff. Since I am pressed for time, I will simply have to adapt to the circumstances."
"It would be riskier still to go with a malfunctioning cyber-mastiff. Since I am pressed for time, I will simply have to adapt to the circumstances."
"It would be riskier still to go with a malfunctioning cyber-mastiff. Since I am pressed for time, I will simply have to adapt to the circumstances."
"It would be riskier still to go with a malfunctioning cyber-mastiff. Since I am pressed for time, I will simply have to adapt to the circumstances."

languages.text: "Es wäre noch riskanter, mit einem defekten Cyber-Mastiff zu gehen. Nachdem ich unter Zeitdruck stehe, muss ich mich den Umständen anpassen."
languages.original_text: "It would be riskier still to go with a malfunctioning cyber-mastiff. Since I am pressed for time, I will simply have to adapt to the circumstances."

traits.locale_text: "Es wäre noch riskanter, mit einem defekten Cyber-Mastiff zu gehen. Nachdem ich unter Zeitdruck stehe, muss ich mich den Umständen anpassen."

languages.text: « Il serait plus risqué d'emmener un cyber-mastiff endommagé. Comme le temps presse, je vais simplement devoir m'adapter. »
languages.original_text: "It would be riskier still to go with a malfunctioning cyber-mastiff. Since I am pressed for time, I will simply have to adapt to the circumstances."

traits.locale_text: « Il serait plus risqué d'emmener un cyber-mastiff endommagé. Comme le temps presse, je vais simplement devoir m'adapter. »

languages.text: “如果带着出了故障的生化獒犬执行任务，那恐怕会更冒险。由于时间紧迫，我也只能勉强将就一下了。”
languages.original_text: "It would be riskier still to go with a malfunctioning cyber-mastiff. Since I am pressed for time, I will simply have to adapt to the circumstances."

traits.locale_text: “如果带着出了故障的生化獒犬执行任务，那恐怕会更冒险。由于时间紧迫，我也只能勉强将就一下了。”

languages.text: «Más arriesgado sería ir con un cibermastín averiado. Puesto que el tiempo apremia, me veo obligado a adaptarme a las circunstancias».
languages.original_text: "It would be riskier still to go with a malfunctioning cyber-mastiff. Since I am pressed for time, I will simply have to adapt to the circumstances."

traits.locale_text: «Más arriesgado sería ir con un cibermastín averiado. Puesto que el tiempo apremia, me veo obligado a adaptarme a las circunstancias».

languages.text: 「故障したサイバーマスチフと一緒に行くのはもっと危険です。時間がないので、状況に合わせるしかありません」
languages.original_text: "It would be riskier still to go with a malfunctioning cyber-mastiff. Since I am pressed for time, I will simply have to adapt to the circumstances."

traits.locale_text: 「故障したサイバーマスチフと一緒に行くのはもっと危険です。時間がないので、状況に合わせるしかありません」

languages.text: "Arızalı bir siber mastifle gitmek daha tehlikeli olurdu. Vakit darlığından duruma ayak uydurmam gerekecek."
languages.original_text: "It would be riskier still to go with a malfunctioning cyber-mastiff. Since I am pressed for time, I will simply have to adapt to the circumstances."

traits.locale_text: "Arızalı bir siber mastifle gitmek daha tehlikeli olurdu. Vakit darlığından duruma ayak uydurmam gerekecek."
